title: Taking Woodstock Font
content:
I need help identifying the font in the Taking Woodstock movie poster. I've looked through the archives for groovy, 60s/70s typefaces and come across a few good ones but I'm not sold yet. Thanks for your help. Simone  
(ps) What's this poster style called - I cannot remember!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [taking\_woodstock.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141016154548/http:/typophile.com/files/taking_woodstock.jpg) | 82.58 KB |
author: searnhardt

comments.content:
This is what is often referred to as psychadelic type. It's going to be hand-drawn in order to be wrapping in this style.

[Arnold Boecklin](http://web.archive.org/web/20141016154548/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/arnold-boecklin/) is probably the most well known psychadelic style typeface.
Is that an official poster? Seems a bit daring for Hollywood these days. I don't see any Trajan on it anywhere.
